version_description:
We are making continuous improvements to your experience!
- For new Gorillas users, you can now see on our website and inside the Gorillas app's browsing mode if we already deliver to you!
- We improved the Gorillas shopping experience and fixed bugs for you.
Please send us your feedback to feedback@gorillasapp.com, we are looking forward to hearing from you!

The legend says that there are people updating apps so often, their app works like a charm.
- We improved the Gorillas experience and fixed bugs for you. Go try it out!!!

The legend says that there are people updating apps so often, their app works like a charm.
- We improved the Gorillas experience and fixed bugs for you. Go try it out!!!

We are making continuous improvements to your experience!
- We improved the Gorillas shopping experience and fixed bugs for you

We update the Gorillas app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are our of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:
- Various bug fixes & improvements

We update the Gorillas app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you. Here are our of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update:
- Various bug fixes & improvements

Hello there, here is the new update. hooray!

Features:
- Brand new sign-up flow with the fancy designs. Yay!
- New rider icon. Can you catch that little cutie? Screenshot and share on social media! Donâ€™t forget to tag @gorillasapp


Bugs:
- The weather is getting warmer, the insects are waking up from long winter. We squashed a lot of bugs in this release to make your experience insects free.

We are making continuous improvements to your experience! Here are some of the enhancements you'll find in the latest update: 
- Improved your profile overview 
- Added more information to the products to improve your shopping experience 
- Added the Italian language 
- Fixed bugs. Go try it out :)
